My friends i have been working on this project for a while and i would love to show it to you first and have your help in testing it and finding what should i enhance more and what should i totally remove. 
the project url is www.pensqr.com and as it is still beta and private here is a full access code Pri859
please feel free to invite any of your friends who can help us with that and can help spreading the word.
Thanks x 3
